New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers set a new franchise record with a 14-0 start, the longest winning streak in team history
Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell scored a season-high 37 points, including 18 in the fourth quarter, to secure the win
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers' coach Kenny Atkinson has implemented an up-tempo offensive system with effective ball movement and spacing
Post-Match Reflections: Donovan Mitchell and coach Kenny Atkinson praised the team's effort and preparation, with Mitchell highlighting his leadership role
Miscellaneous Highlights: The team celebrated with a frog mascot after the game, adding a unique touch to their perfect start
